00054 template<typename T> class pinned_allocator;
00055 
00056 template<>
00057   class pinned_allocator<void>
00058 {
00059   public:
00060     typedef void           value_type;
00061     typedef void       *   pointer;
00062     typedef const void *   const_pointer;
00063     typedef std::size_t    size_type;
00064     typedef std::ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00065 
00066     // convert a pinned_allocator<void> to pinned_allocator<U>
00067     template<typename U>
00068       struct rebind
00069     {
00070       typedef pinned_allocator<U> other;
00071     }; // end rebind
00072 }; // end pinned_allocator
00073 
00074 
00075 template<typename T>
00076   class pinned_allocator
00077 {
00078   public:
00079     typedef T              value_type;
00080     typedef T*             pointer;
00081     typedef const T*       const_pointer;
00082     typedef T&             reference;
00083     typedef const T&       const_reference;
00084     typedef std::size_t    size_type;
00085     typedef std::ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00086 
00087     // convert a pinned_allocator<T> to pinned_allocator<U>
00088     template<typename U>
00089       struct rebind
00090     {
00091       typedef pinned_allocator<U> other;
00092     }; // end rebind
00093 
00096     __host__ __device__
00097     inline pinned_allocator() {}
00098 
00101     __host__ __device__
00102     inline ~pinned_allocator() {}
00103 
00106     __host__ __device__
00107     inline pinned_allocator(pinned_allocator const &) {}
00108 
00114     template<typename U>
00115     __host__ __device__
00116     inline pinned_allocator(pinned_allocator<U> const &) {}
00117 
00124     __host__ __device__
00125     inline pointer address(reference r) { return &r; }
00126 
00133     __host__ __device__
00134     inline const_pointer address(const_reference r) { return &r; }
00135 
00145     __host__
00146     inline pointer allocate(size_type cnt,
00147                             const_pointer = 0)
00148     {
00149       if(cnt > this->max_size())
00150       {
00151         throw std::bad_alloc();
00152       } // end if
00153 
00154       pointer result(0);
00155       cudaError_t error = cudaMallocHost(reinterpret_cast<void**>(&result), cnt * sizeof(value_type));
00156 
00157       if(error)
00158       {
00159         throw std::bad_alloc();
00160       } // end if
00161 
00162       return result;
00163     } // end allocate()
00164 
00175     __host__
00176     inline void deallocate(pointer p, size_type cnt)
00177     {
00178       cudaError_t error = cudaFreeHost(p);
00179       
00180       if(error)
00181       {
00182         throw thrust::system_error(error, thrust::cuda_category());
00183       } // end if
00184     } // end deallocate()
00185 
00192     inline size_type max_size() const
00193     {
00194       return (std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max)() / sizeof(T);
00195     } // end max_size()
00196 
00203     __host__ __device__
00204     inline bool operator==(pinned_allocator const& x) { return true; }
00205 
00212     __host__ __device__
00213     inline bool operator!=(pinned_allocator const &x) { return !operator==(x); }
00214 }; // end pinned_allocator
00215 
00219 } // end experimental
